replies.body: having the same issues. tried to make a free twitch prime trial and ive been charged for it. cannot link account either keeps redirecting to NA site.

Being charged is on the Twitch side of things not League, so you'll have to talk to their support about that one. As for linking the account, try a different browser, and failing that, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I know there were some issues a few hours ago, though I am unsure if this was related.

Try again now and hopefully it'll work for you. If not:

* Try a different browser.
* Log out and back in.
* Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
